record.title: AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET
record.narrative:
AUTHORITY FOR COMMITTEES TO MEET -- (Senate - April 28, 2008)

[Page: S3449]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Relations be authorized to meet during the session of the Senate on Monday, April 28, 2008, at 4 p.m. to hold a nomination hearing.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
